entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 12:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: WSW 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near noon. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast near noon. Wind becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
